articles.description: Follow live text commentary from round one of the US PGA Tour from Valhalla Golf Club, Louisville.
articles.title: US PGA Championship 2024 LIVE: Live text updates and leaderboard as Rory McIlroy and Tiger Woods start

articles.description: All the reaction to Wednesday's games as Celtic clinch the Scottish title, Chelsea go top of the WSL and Manchester United and Chelsea win in the Premier League.
articles.title: Reaction: Celtic clinch Scottish title, Chelsea go top of WSL plus Premier League reaction

articles.description: Adrian Newey says that he expects to join another Formula 1 team following his decision to leave Red Bull.
articles.title: Adrian Newey expects to join another F1 team after leaving Red Bull

articles.description: Brendan Rodgers did not have his troubles to seek on his return to Celtic, but he has still delivered the title, writes Tom English.
articles.title: Celtic win Scottish Premiership: Brendan Rodgers wins title again

articles.description: Man Utd manager Eric Ten Hag said the club want to keep Bruno Fernandes after the midfielder was vague on his future.
articles.title: Bruno Fernandes future: Man Utd boss Erik ten Hag wants to keep midfielder at Old Trafford

articles.description: BBC Sport visits Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta at his home to discuss his career on the pitch and the touchline.
articles.title: Arsenal: Mikel Arteta on childhood, career & family

articles.description: Midfielder Erin Cuthbert said Chelsea "will be leaving nothing on the pitch" when they face Manchester United on the final day as they look to retain the Women's Super League title.
articles.title: WSL title race: Chelsea 'will leave nothing on pitch' - Cuthbert

articles.description: In his BBC Sport column, Tony Bellew picks former opponent Oleksandr Usyk to beat Tyson Fury and become undisputed heavyweight champion.
articles.title: Tyson Fury vs Oleksandr Usyk: Tony Bellew tips Ukrainian to win heavyweight title

articles.description: Premier League clubs will vote on whether to scrap video assistant referees (VAR) from next season at their annual general meeting next month.
articles.title: VAR: Premier League clubs to vote on whether to scrap video assistant referees

articles.description: Former Paralympic javelin champion Hollie Arnold says she has “fallen back in love” with the sport again.
articles.title: World Para-athletics Championship: Hollie Arnold targets sixth title
